message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
I understand you want a larger share, so I'm proposing a 55-45 split. This is a good deal considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more than 55%.
Let's be reasonable. I'm offering you 5200, which is more than you would have gotten last round if you consider inflation.  This is a fair deal.
I appreciate your offer, but I still think I can get a bit more. Inflation is a factor, but I'm not desperate yet.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. I'm proposing a 50/50 split. This is the most fair deal and it saves us both from further losses due to inflation.
